title: Changwon Football Center
text:
The Changwon Football Centre Stadium () is a <a href="football-specific%20stadium">football-specific stadium</a> and training ground in <a href="Changwon">Changwon</a>, South Korea. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches. The stadium holds 15,074 people. It was built in 2009
Currently, it is the home ground of the <a href="K%20League%202">K League 2</a> side <a href="Gyeongnam%20FC">Gyeongnam FC</a> and the <a href="K3%20League">K3 League</a> side <a href="Changwon%20City%20FC">Changwon City FC</a>.
